name: Arbiter

skills.name: Gaze of Justice
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Double hit. Each hit can place Weaken.

skills.notes: Each hit can place Weaken. Useful for boss and wave damage.

skills.name: Enforced Humility
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance of decreasing the duration of all enemy buffs by 1 turn.

effects.notes: AoE. 75% chance to decrease buff duration.

skills.notes: Key for Arena and Hydra to strip buffs.

skills.name: Mentor of Heroes
skills.description: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 30% and places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Heals all allies by 25% of their MAX HP if they have less than 50% HP.

effects.notes: Heals all allies by 25% of their MAX HP if they have less than 50% HP.

skills.notes: Signature speed boost and heal. Core for Arena and PvE.

skills.name: Destinyâ€™s Call
skills.description: Revives all dead allies to 35% HP, then fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 20%. Grants an Extra Turn to this Champion if an ally was successfully revived.

effects.notes: Revives all dead allies to 35% HP.
Fills Turn Meter of all allies by 20%.

skills.notes: Revive plus extra turn allows immediate follow-up with A3.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 30%.
forms.comments: Arbiter is the premier speed lead and reviver for Arena, Dungeons, and Doom Tower. Her kit is essential for progression and PvP.

stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 350+ SPD, HP%/DEF% for tank, ACC for debuffing

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. Will use revive and speed boost on auto. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion, but enables speed and revive strategies.

mechanics_advisory: Arbiter's speed aura and turn meter boost are meta-defining for Arena and PvE. Build for maximum speed and survivability.
author: GitHub Copilot
